data.lyric:
[ti:Heartbreak Anniversary]
[ar:Giveon]
[al:Heartbreak Anniversary]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Heartbreak Anniversary - Giveon
[00:04.12]Lyrics by：Giveon Evans/Varren Wade/Sevn Thomas
[00:08.24]Composed by：Giveon Evans/Varren Wade/Sevn Thomas/Maneesh
[00:12.36]Ooh
[00:15.90]Balloons are deflated
[00:19.73]Guess they look lifeless like me
[00:23.31]We miss you on your side of the bed mmm
[00:30.63]Still got your things here
[00:34.13]And they stare at me like souvenirs
[00:38.24]Don't wanna let you out my head
[00:43.97]Just like the day that I met you the day I thought forever
[00:48.19]Said that you love me but that'll last for never
[00:51.81]It's cold outside like when you walked out my life
[00:55.68]Why you walk out my life
[00:59.43]I get like this every time
[01:05.87]On these days that feel like you and me
[01:10.31]Heartbreak anniversary
[01:14.04]'Cause I remember every time
[01:20.55]On these days that feel like you and me
[01:25.15]Heartbreak anniversary do you ever think of me
[01:30.79]Oh-ooh
[01:34.43]No
[01:35.47]Ooh
[01:36.73]No no no
[01:39.22]Ooh ooh
[01:40.59]Ooh nah
[01:43.13]Ooh
[01:44.42]I'm buildin' my hopes up
[01:48.00]Like presents unopened to this day
[01:51.61]I still see the messages you read mmm
[01:59.13]I'm foolishly patient
[02:01.28]Foolishly patient
[02:02.96]Can't get past the taste of your lips
[02:04.93]Taste of your lips
[02:06.81]Don't wanna let you out my head
[02:12.57]Just like the day that I met you the day I thought forever
[02:16.81]Said that you love me but that'll last for never
[02:20.33]It's cold outside like when you walked out my life
[02:24.25]Why you walk out my life
[02:25.78]My life
[02:28.06]I get like this every time
[02:34.49]On these days that feel like you and me
[02:39.01]Heartbreak anniversary
[02:42.62]'Cause I remember every time
[02:49.32]On these days that feel like you and me
[02:53.69]Heartbreak anniversary do you ever think of me
[02:59.43]Oh-ooh
[03:00.77]Of me
[03:02.07]Ooh
[03:04.12]'Cause I think of you think of you
[03:07.90]Ooh ooh ooh-ooh
data.trans:
[ti:Heartbreak Anniversary]
[ar:Giveon]
[al:Heartbreak Anniversary]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.12]//
[00:08.24]//
[00:12.36]//
[00:15.90]气球漏了气
[00:19.73]我想它们看起来跟我一样没有生机
[00:23.31]我们想念你躺在另一半床上的时候
[00:30.63]你的东西还留在这里
[00:34.13]它们像纪念品一样紧盯着我
[00:38.24]不想让你从我的脑海中消失
[00:43.97]就像我与你相遇的那天 那天我以为会是永远
[00:48.19]你说你爱我 但你的爱转瞬即逝
[00:51.81]外面天寒地冻 就像你离开我生活的那时候
[00:55.68]为什么你要从我的生命中出走
[00:59.43]我每一次都像这样
[01:05.87]这些日子 感觉你和我
[01:10.31]度过了心碎的周年纪念
[01:14.04]因为每一次我都会记得
[01:20.55]这些日子 感觉你和我
[01:25.15]度过了心碎的周年纪念 你有没有想起过我
[01:30.79]//
[01:34.43]//
[01:35.47]//
[01:36.73]//
[01:39.22]//
[01:40.59]//
[01:43.13]//
[01:44.42]我筑起了希望 
[01:48.00]就像今天还未拆开的礼物
[01:51.61]我还在看着你读过的短信
[01:59.13]我耐心得愚蠢
[02:01.28]耐心得愚蠢
[02:02.96]无法忘怀你嘴唇的味道
[02:04.93]你嘴唇的味道
[02:06.81]不想让你从我的脑海中消失
[02:12.57]就像我与你相遇的那天 那天我以为会是永远
[02:16.81]你说你爱我 但你的爱转瞬即逝
[02:20.33]外面天寒地冻 就像你离开我生活的那时候
[02:24.25]为什么你要从我的生命中出走
[02:25.78]我的生命
[02:28.06]我每一次都像这样
[02:34.49]这些日子 感觉你和我
[02:39.01]度过了心碎的周年纪念
[02:42.62]因为每一次我都会记得
[02:49.32]这些日子 感觉你和我
[02:53.69]度过了心碎的周年纪念 你有没有想起过我
[02:59.43]//
[03:00.77]想起我
[03:02.07]//
[03:04.12]因为我在想你 在想你
[03:07.90]//
